description: This file contains CSS styles for an interactive Tic Tac Toe game, defining styles for theme management and various UI components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and a defined background color.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game layout with maximum width and padding.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Displays the game status in bold with a specified margin and color.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board with specified columns and gaps.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Individual squares in the game board, styled with colors, borders, and hover effects.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Flex container for control buttons with specified spacing and layout.

classes.name: control-button
classes.description: Styled button for game control actions with hover effects.

classes.name: scoreboard
classes.description: Displays game scores in a styled box with shadowing.

classes.name: scores
classes.description: Flex container for displaying individual scores.

classes.name: score-item
classes.description: Container for a player's score and name.

classes.name: player
classes.description: Styles the player's name in the scoreboard.

classes.name: score
classes.description: Styled representation of the player's score.
